title: The Age of Peace
description: The purpose of this book is to re-engineer the minds of those who think in terms of violence. The book has a two-fold target : First to help those who are engaged in violence to realise that the present age is an age of peace. Second, the Author expounds on the guiding principles that should govern the actions of those who want to establish peace in society.The book is copyright free
author: Wahiduddin Khan
